EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal VIP Party at CF Summit_Basel_Q418.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation | Pivotal VIP Party at CF Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal VIP Party on the 10th of October at Baltazar in Basel. Please make sure to pick up your VIP wristband from the Pivotal booth at CF Summit for entry to the party.
Date: Wednesday, 10 October
Time:
7:30PM to 11:00PM
Location: Baltazar <[[http://www.baltazarbar.ch]]> Steinenbachgässlein 34 4051 Basel
Please note: the bar front entrance is up the stairs at the end of the alleyway. We look forward to seeing you there!
Best Regards,
The Pivotal Team PARTY DETAILS <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/Pivotal-VIP-Party-at-Cloud-Foundry-Summit.html]]>
